name: Friendly Favours (18+)
description:
Summary:

You just moved to a city and made your first friend: a friendly neighbour from your apartment building named Yuka. You both hit it off, but will you end up as just friends, or more?

There are 2 endings to the story, but it's more about the journey than the destination! Friendly Favours is inspired by the "wholesome" tag of slice-of-life doujinshis and anime. Learn about the main character and Yuka, their stories, and what draws them together!

Warning: This game contains 18+ elements, please be 18+ years of age before playing.

Game information:

  • Format: Visual novel 
  • Genre: Slice of life, romance
  • Length: 10K+ words
  • Language: English

Credits:

  • Art, story and programming: ParkGDev
  • Music: Royalty free music by Bryan Teoh, Rafael Krux, Kevin Macleod, Alexander Nakarada, Orchestralis and Pixabay

Future VNs:

Friendly Favours is the first visual novel completed by novice solo developer, ParkGDev (that's me!). It is also the first VN in an anthology of planned stories that will be developed in the future.

My aim is to create short yet sweet VNs, with meaningful stories and characters.

This project is meant to be completely free, with no exclusive in-game contents. But, any support will help me make better and more polished VNs in the future. You can donate or be a patron: https://www.patreon.com/parkgdev, and watch as the project grows.

Any constructive feedback will be very much appreciated! Cheers!
